old:
一人、火垂れ山へ向かうネド王子を追って
火垂れ山の入口を目指す
new:
Follow Prince Nedo to the entrance of 
Firefall Mountain.

old: ウルテカ山岳の北部、火垂れ山の麓へ向かう
new:
Head towards the foothills of the northern part 
of the Urteca Mountains, 
towards Firefall Mountain.

old: 立ちふさがる魔物を打ち破る
new: Strike down the enemy that stands in your way.

old: 麓を抜けた先の火垂れ山入口を目指す
new:
Head towards the entrance of Firefall Mountain, 
beyond the foot of the mountain.

old: レスタニアに帰還しジョゼフに報告する
new: Return to Lestania and report to Joseph
